## Background

- The Hospital Standardised Mortality Ratios publication is released quarterly
- Risk-adjusted mortality rates for a selection of Scottish hospitals
- Produced in traditional the publication format of a **static pdf document** with accompanying **excel tables**.
- Production uses **proprietary software** and is **time-consuming**, involving extensive manual formatting and checking.


## Project Aim

- Move all data wrangling from SPSS to R
- Use RMarkdown to automate publication documents
- Use R to automate Excel tables
- RAP level 7 (R package)
